access: This is a ground level room, no upstairs available. Two cats do live in the property upstairs but will not have access to the downstairs private area, 350sq ft total space.
description:
Great modernly designed room with a private bath and patio, provides a comfortable yet beautiful stay. The private patio has an amazing view &  sunsets! Great location and walking distance to Centennial Park and itâ€™s beautiful lake. Shopping, strip malls and restaurants around! One parking space and private entrance. Landry room per request. City of Downtown Chicago 45 min drive. Tinley Park conventional center and Hollywood Casino Amphitheater 15 min away. Hosts do live on the second floor.

Gas fireplace by request, 50 inch TV with basic television and NETFLIX included, hardwood flooring, L shape sofa for additional guests.

This is a ground level room, no upstairs available. Two cats do live in the property upstairs but will not have access to the downstairs private area, 350sq ft total space.

Hosts do live on the property but if not home, will be available to contact by phone.

Quiet and peaceful neighborhood, never any disturbances. The home is right by Centennial Park and Lake Sedgewick, Tennis,  basketball courts, and a park across the street are open as well, mainly during warmer seasons. Running/biking trail behind the complexes available.

Bus stops available within .5 miles, UBERs are always near as well.

2 bikes by request during summer season
Laundry room by request 
Complimentary snacks and water
Cups, coffee and coffee maker
interaction: Hosts do live on the property but if not home, will be available to contact by phone.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet and peaceful neighborhood, never any disturbances. The home is right by Centennial Park and Lake Sedgewick, Tennis,  basketball courts, and a park across the street are open as well, mainly during warmer seasons. Running/biking trail behind the complexes available.
notes:
2 bikes by request during summer season
Laundry room by request 
Complimentary snacks and water
Cups, coffee and coffee maker
space: Gas fireplace by request, 50 inch TV with basic television and NETFLIX included, hardwood flooring, L shape sofa for additional guests.
summary: Great modernly designed room with a private bath and patio, provides a comfortable yet beautiful stay. The private patio has an amazing view &  sunsets! Great location and walking distance to Centennial Park and itâ€™s beautiful lake. Shopping, strip malls and restaurants around! One parking space and private entrance. Landry room per request. City of Downtown Chicago 45 min drive. Tinley Park conventional center and Hollywood Casino Amphitheater 15 min away. Hosts do live on the second floor.
transit: Bus stops available within .5 miles, UBERs are always near as well.

description:
2bd, 1ba condo in North Kenwood - located a half a mile from Hyde Park & a seven minute drive to downtown. Enjoy over 1000 sqft of living space.

Location, location, location!

Historical art, photos & books for your enjoyment. 
Eclectic vibe.
Washer/Dryer
Dishwasher
Hardwood Floors

Recessed Lighting
Wifi

A park is located next door with a running path.

Seven minute drive to downtown.

Easy Uber access.

access: Easy access to the gym available at the building. Feel free to use all the apartment area.
description:
The comfort and modernity you deserve is here in this amazing apartment, perfect for couples, friends and business travelers! Here you will enjoy an enormous KING BED for pleasant nights and a HUGE TV with NETFLIX for a nice chill. You can visit the most famous features like Mag Mile, Navy Pier and 360 Chicago which is just steps away! Building is surrounded by restaurants, stores, bars and more! Have an amazing stay!

There is a big TV and Wi-Fi with high speed. Body soap, shampoo, large towels and a hairdryer are provided for your convenience. You are able to sit and relax in our family room where we have a comfortable sofa and you can watch Netflix. We also offer a king size bed, bed linens, extra pillows, blankets and a closet to accommodate your clothes. 
There is a complete kitchen made thinking in the prepare of your meals, so you will find everything you need. And if you do not want to cook, you can enjoy the bests restaurants at your doorstep. Chicago has any number of restaurants to suit all tastes very close to the apartment. 
Complete bathroom with all amenities needed: shampoo, conditioner, body soap and hair dryer!

Easy access to the gym available at the building. Feel free to use all the apartment area.

This is entirely up to a guestâ€™s preference. We will send you a welcome message to walk you through check-in and the rest is up to you! We will be available when you need me through text, email or phone. We are more than happy to chat or assist with anything.

This is an extremely easy area to find restaurants, stores, bars, shoppings, FUN in general, everything a walking distance to the building. You will love this place.

access: You will also have access to the building's fitness center that features Peloton bikes!
description:
Upgrade your Chicago experience and stay in this modern Domio apartment. There are also restaurants and bars just about 10 min walk. Here youâ€™ll find all the comforts of home: full kitchen, custom artwork, and furnishings curated to reflect the beauty of the Windy City. Whether traveling solo, with friends, or with family, see the best of history, architecture, and bites that Chicago has to offer.

This beautiful 2 bedroom apartment features a queen bed in each bedroom. Additionally, the living room has an air mattress. 

There is also an in-unit washer/dryer for easy laundry!

You will also have access to the building's fitness center that features Peloton bikes!

LaSalle Street Train station is about a 6 minute walk from the apartment. Additionally, many of Chicago's top attractions are a short Lyft ride away.

Safety is our top priority!  To maintain a safe community for our guests, neighbors, and team members, we do conduct a background screening check for all reservations prior to your stay.  This screening includes checking the National Criminal & OFAC Database for felonies and the National Sex Offender Registry.  If you have any questions about this process, please contact us.


Registration Number: R19000043277

Please note that we do not allow bookings from residents of Chicago and surrounding areas.

access: You have full use of the unit. You can cook in the full size kitchen. Utensils and cookware and basic ingredients (salt and pepper, oil if available) are available. I have coffee and a coffee maker for you. Do your laundry if you like (you just have to buy or bring your own soap, softener, etc.) I also supply liquid body wash so just bring your own loofah sponge.
description:
This unit is located on a highly cultural diverse community called Pilsen.  Down the block is a local grocery store and a Bob's Pizza. Walk 5 min. south and you run into whatever you need for food. Also there is a 15 min public bus ride to McCormick place, China town and Lake Shore Drive. A 10 minute walk North gets you on the Pink line EL Train to downtown Chicago in 15 minutes. Also 18th St. offers restaurants and unique shops. Ride shares are easily accessible to Chicago sites.

My space is a newly renovated 3 bedroom, 2 full bath ground unit with new SS appliances, Granite CTs, wood tile flooring, Washer/Dryer in-unit, and plenty of closet space. You and/or your guest(s) will have full use of the unit. It can sleep up to 8 adults comfortably. I have a twin trundle bed in one of the bedrooms and wide and comfortable sofas guest have slept on. Air mattresses are available upon request.

You have full use of the unit. You can cook in the full size kitchen. Utensils and cookware and basic ingredients (salt and pepper, oil if available) are available. I have coffee and a coffee maker for you. Do your laundry if you like (you just have to buy or bring your own soap, softener, etc.) I also supply liquid body wash so just bring your own loofah sponge.

I pretty much leave you alone :) but I'm easily reachable via text and phone.

You get to experience being one of the Chicago locals here and away from tourists. Brand new Bob's Pizza at the end of the block. Local grocery store down the block across the pizza place. Local bar with music 2 blocks away. Catholic church is 3 blocks way. Bus stops, post office, unique shops, and area restaurants on 18th street are walking distance.

Free Parking space for 1 car available in the rear of building, additional space is available for $10/car/night. Perfect location for ride sharing services (Uber/Lyft). Public transportation is readily available. City (Divvy) bikes are also available for rent down the street.

For your safety and the safety of other residents in the building, security cameras have been placed on the outside perimeter of the building.

Absolutely NO PARTIES of any kind allowed. Unauthorized parties will get you kicked out of the unit with local police escort and no refunds. 

There is an extra guest fee of $25/guest/night so please be sure to indicate the number of guests in the beginning of your reservation, inquiry, or requests. If you forget to do this, I will make the adjustment at the end of your stay. 

One free parking space is included with your reservation, should you need more spaces, there is a $15 per night charge to rent one more space from one of the residents in the building. 

Please DO NOT FLUSH other paper products, except toilet paper, down the toilet. 
i.e. Flushable wipes ARE NOT flushable.

access: I'm flexible and friendly! My bedroom is off limits but otherwise you're welcome to hang with me wherever!
description:
Clean, bright, modern-ish space in Logan Square to share with me! The room is equipped with Apple TV, 6 drawer dresser, and hanging rack. Condo access provides updated kitchen with granite counters, plates, glassware, and anything necessary for cooking breakfast, lunch, or dinner. Coffee and tea for all guests. Dining room houses a beautiful Carrera marble table and mirrored desk. Living room has TV access! Free parking, cocktails, and wifi!

This recent vintage gut rehab is the perfect touch of modern and classic decor with marble, mirrors, and gold everywhere! Homey and inviting while well decorated and soon to be featured on The Everygirl!

I'm flexible and friendly! My bedroom is off limits but otherwise you're welcome to hang with me wherever!

I'm a consulting mixologist and know the food and beverage scene quite well! Always happy to make a recommendation or show you where to go!

Primarily hispanic, there are plenty of awesome traditional taco joints in the area!

3/4th of a mile from the blue line and access to the bus is two blocks away!

Condo access provides updated kitchen with granite counters, plates, glassware, and anything necessary for cooking breakfast, lunch, or dinner. Coffee and tea for all guests. Dining room houses a beautiful Carrera marble table and mirrored desk. Living room has TV access! Free parking, cocktails, and wifi!

additional_house_rules:
House Rules

1. Reservations require a $400 security deposit that is not charged in advance.

2. Guests can cancel free of charge within 24 hours of booking (please contact us to process the refund). Youâ€™ll be charged 50% of the booking price (minus the service fee) if you cancel more than seven days before arrival, and 100% of the total price if you cancel within seven days of arrival.

3. Check-in is at 4 pm. Checkout is at 11 am. Early check-in or late checkout may be available upon request. Guests who stay beyond their designated checkout time or delay our housekeeping staff are liable for any associated costs and expenses.

4. Guests are not allowed to make a reservation in their city of residence. Please contact us if you're booking within your city.

5. Smoking, parties, and excessive noise are not allowed, including on balconies and in shared spaces. Smoking violations are subject to a $250 fine plus the cost to clean, deodorize, and repair damages.

6. Commercial photography/videography without written consent, Illegal activity, prostitution, and possession of firearms is strictly prohibited.

7. Overnight guests that exceed the number stated in the reservation are not allowed.

8. Pets are not allowed. Violation of our pet policy may result in a fine. We encourage guests with service animals to contact us before their stay.

9. Guests are responsible for covering the cost to replace lost keys, key cards, fobs, or parking passes.

10. Sonder properties may use video surveillance in public areas. Noise detecting technology may be used inside the suite to monitor excessive noise levels. 

11. Guests take full responsibility for damages, injury, or loss that occur on the premises and its facilities. Guests must report any property damage to customer service. Unreported damages will be deducted from the security deposit.

12. Booking a reservation constitutes an agreement to comply with the House Rules. Guests who violate these rules are liable for any associated damages, fees, costs, or expenses.

description:
Featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and Fast Company, weâ€™ve hosted over 350k guests in 2,500+ spaces with an average rating of 4.6 stars. Each space is designed and run by us, so youâ€™ll always know what to expect from your stay. At Sonder, weâ€™ve combined the best parts of home and hotel.

- 24/7 support via text, email, or phone
- Coffee, fresh towels, and bathroom essentials provided
- Hotel-standard cleaning before you arrive
- Self check-in

- In-suite laundry
- Fully-equipped kitchen

Building amenities
- Rooftop terrace

Greektown highlights
- Walkability score: 93
- 3 minute walk to Greek Islands (eatery specializing in traditional Greek cuisine)
- 6 minute walk to Lou Mitchell's (historic diner serving breakfast and lunch)

Getting around
- 1 block to Halsted & Jackson bus stop
- 10 minute drive to downtown
- 60 minute drive to ORD Airport

Known for its perfect mix of modernism and tradition, Greektown stuns with vibrant markets and rich history. Originally a popular settling place for Greek immigrants, the neighborhood has maintained its warm culture of hospitality and friendliness.  With easy access to downtown, you can experience genuine Greek culture through authentic eateries like Artopolis and Greek Islands or family-owned businesses like the Athenian Candle Company.

There is no elevator.

This Sonder is centrally located and prone to city and construction noise.

There's no cable. We've provided an HDMI cord for streaming.

License: HL 2684667

Cozy, peaceful and clean living area  1 bedroom in the lower level with 1 full bathroom may be shared with other guess. My guess are allowed to use the full kitchen and back yard. Enjoy a movie in the private living room area. My rooms are accommadated for 2 guest per room(couples) (friends)(relatives) if you do not want to share tge room you may book an adfitional room.

Huge peaceful, clean single family home, 3 levels 3 bedroom 2 bathrooms, cozy  back yard with a deck and gazebos  where you can relax. Rental bedrooms( 1 room with a king size bed and 2 rooms with queen size beds) granite counter tops in the kitchen. 6 seating dining table. Hardwood floor.

Full acess to the kitchen, dining room, back yard deck, gazebo, laundry room.

We like socializing with our guest, they can text or email me. We live in the house so we can interaction with our guess is most likely to happen  after our working hours, I am also a chef so you might be able to enjoy a meal .(EMAIL HIDDEN) (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)

I have very good neighbors, it's fairly quiet, Brickyard  mall is in walking distance, Applebees, Taco bell, Popeyes, Burger King, McDonalds and many more restaurant's , Riis Park is in walking distance if your in to jogging public transportation near by. Uber is always a call away.

Very easy commuting. Bus routes a block North or East , Highway. Easy to order an Uber.

My pets roam freely around the house on the main floor, my stair ways are blocked off with gates for privacy and to keep my pets away from certain areas of the house.  I maintain my place very clean. If you have Allergies this might not be the place to stay. When using the back yard I only ask you keep the gates locked at all times. Booking is for two guess per room additional fees apply for unexpected guests $25.00. No smoking inside the house. No parties. Laundry room may be used for an additional fee of $25.00. We will provider laundry detergent and softener. I provide body wash, wash towels, shampoo,conditioner, lotion. Bottled Water is provided. For no reason food is allowed in the lower level or rooms. Snacks are ok. Parking is in the street.

description:
* Also See NOTES in "The Space" *
Lovely single family house with large fenced yard. One large bedrm with a good-size closet. Common areas include living, dining, kitchen & laundry rooms. Great for business travelers with office amenities (printer, copier), iron & washer&dryer. 

Quiet & upscale suburbs.  Known for its Frank L Wright hses. Cls to public trans & I-290. 15 min to dwntwn Chicago via train & 20 min by car (normal traffic). Near Loyola Med Ctr & Hines VA & Rush Hsptl

NOTES: 
(1) REASONS FOR YOU TO CHOOSE THIS PLACE TO STAY (see below)
(2) The host typically would like to greet the guests in person, occasionally this may not be possible.  In the latter case, please contact the host for the procedure of "Self Check-in". 
(3) Let the host know if you plan to drive so the parking matter can be addressed if needed.

REASONS FOR YOU TO CHOOSE THIS PLACE TO STAY
Guests choose a place to stay based what it serves them the best.  We would like to highlight a few items worth considering and invite you to book this place.
(a) We run a very efficient operation and have a very competitive room rate with high quality rooms and services;
(b) This house has an exceptional great location.  It is about 10 minutes to a Green Line Station by walking (hence very close to downtown Chicago) and has convenient access to west, north west, and south west of greater Chicagoland by car.
(c) Free parking is provided.  Parking can be very very expensive in any larger metropolitan, including downtown Chicago.  Therefore it is much more economical to park here and take the train to downtown Chicago. If you rent a room in or near downtown Chicago, you implicitly or explicitly spend a lot of money just on parking.
(d) The "Occupancy Tax" is about 11% here which is much less than 23% or higher (doubled) in Chicago. The occupancy tax is paid by the guests based on the sum of room rate and cleaning fee.  With this tax and parking cost in mind, it is much more economical (and without losing convenient access to downtown Chicago) to stay in a convenient suburbs rather than in Chicago or downtown Chicago. Since the "Occupancy Tax" is waived if you stay 31 days or longer, you can avoid this tax and save quite a bit of money if you plan your trip ahead and check with the host for room availability.

====== Other Information  ========
Cereal, waffles and coffee are provided by the host for the ARRIVAL day/night of the guests. A full service restaurant (Blue Max Cafe) is only a block north of the house (serves breakfast and lunch only). Various fast food and slow food restaurants are also very close.  A great oriental message service is just couple blocks south of the house (not too expensive, please get coupon from the host for one-time discount).

The house is the middle of Oak Park and Forest Park downtown (almost equal distance).  You have access to 24 hours super markets, and all sorts of other stores and entertainment in both downtown, plus big Chicago downtown of course. Come to stay in the house, and enjoy both the big Chicago, and friendly cute downtown in both Oak Park and Forest Park.

description:
Great view of moving train, a high-rise garden & downtown Chicago. 

Great location. Walking distance to Willis Tower, Chicago River, River Walk, Millennium Park, Magnificent Mile, shopping and dining on French market, open market, night market, Block 37, State street & Michigan avenue.

Great convenient for public transportation, L line train station (includes Blue line from/to O'hare airport), Amtrak, Metra (Ogilvie/Union station), CTA, bus stations.

Great common areas, gardens, 24/7 security

24 hours security and resident service. Free wifi in the apartment and common areas. Separate laundry room. Contact host for parking with resident's discount.

Check in after 12 noon
Check out before 9am

Coffee shop in the building
Several food courts around the building
Whole food, Mariano, H-mart grocery in walkin distance
Highlight tourist attractions with map, restaurant, delivery food number available at check in

description:
Wonderful 2 bedroom apartment with office containing a pullout. 
Great living room space and backyard. 
Tree lined streets and unzoned parking out front. 
Very near blue line and Logan Square shops.
Cozy and quaint.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms a full living room and a back room that has a pullout queen sized unit.   There is 1 full bathroom.  A kitchen that has everything You would need except food. 

  You have booked the entire space.  


There is a back yard and places to sit and relax. 

Please be respectful as this is a 3 flat apartment building and common spaces are shared.
Also the space is pet friendly so sometimes there may have  been pets in the space. 
Be mindful if you are traveling with a pet to inform me so I can coordinate. 
There is a back yard and please clean up after your pet.

Guests can use the entire apartment.  
Also available is a back yard and laundry area.

Great neighborhood.  Loads of bars and restaurants nearby.  Tree lined streets and very close to public transit.   Logan Square blue line

You can rent bikes and scooters.   You can use lyft or ubber and the train and bus are very close by

access: You have a private front and back entrance, and free laundry.
description:
Newly renovated garden apartment in trendy North Center neighborhood. Excellent location, close to transit, bikeshare, parks, locally celebrated restaurants, multiple breweries, groceries, and drugstore. 

Relax in your comfortable beds, enjoy the convenience and economy of cooking in your fully equipped kitchen, and live like a local in an authentic Chicago neighborhood.

A full apartment in a three-unit building, owners on-site. Free street parking, across the street from a vibrant city square where there are concerts and farmers markets in the summer.

All this and everything needed for children and toddlers: Two pack'n'plays, booster/high-chair combo, children's dishes/books/toys/games, training potty

You have a private front and back entrance, and free laundry.

Hosts are on-site, and available if the need arises, but will be otherwise fairly hands-off

Our favorite local restaurants within short walking distance:  Marmalade or Savanna for breakfast & lunch, Tuscan Hen Market for sandwiches, Lou Malnotti's pizza, The Bad Apple for phenomenal burgers and cheese curds, Mrs Murphy and Sons Bistro.

There are four microbreweries within walking distance: Dovetail, Begyle, Spiteful, and Half Acre. Go visit their websites for tour information and taproom hours.

If cocktails are more your speed, the Victor Bar is right around the corner.

Or if you're trying to entertain some kids and the back yard isn't cutting it, there is a pocket park at Larchmont & Ravenswood, and a school playground at Belle Plaine & Leavitt. In the event of rain, snow, or oppressive heat, "Present Place" is a lovely indoor play place at Grace & Ravenswood.

Three short blocks to the Irving Park Brown Line; Damen and Irving Park  buses stops 1/2 to 1 block.
CTA website provides fairly accurate schedule
Street Parking is free and doesn't require a permit on our street, but depending on when you're visiting us may be a little difficult to come by. 
There is a bike share station - Divvy - right across the street

Welcome book on entry hall table lists important info and details.

Ceramic wood look tile throughout apt for hygienic & aesthetic  purposes but bring socks or slippers its chilly!

This is a garden apartment under a first floor apartment, so there will be some neighbor noise, but please don't hesitate to notify us if it's disruptive to your stay.

description:
Home Sweet Home is a place where you feel at home; with a modern vibe with a bit of a touch of vintage arts and furnitures. We try to go for the concept of welcomeness; and hope you feel at home too!

*** Weâ€™ve also adopted a puppy, heâ€™s a bundle of joy really friendly and quite. If you donâ€™t feel comfortable with the puppy we can leave him in the room, but let us know in advance! ***

If there is 3 guest (we offer the guest room which is a queen bed for 2, and a twin bed that would fit 1) we will charge the original price it says, but if you want both the room or more then 3 guests youâ€™d have to pay extra fee which is $200 per nightâ€” if itâ€™s more then 4 please input 4 so it doesnâ€™t charge you extra.; or if youâ€™re not too certain what to do, feel free to message me so I can guide you through the process. 
The maximum we could accommodate would be 6 people, where one person would have to sleep on the couch.  
You are welcome to use the kitchen and the living room, if you are only airbnbing one room it will be a shared space.

Myself and my partner will be sharing the kitchen and living room. Weâ€™ll be around a lot,  so feel free to hang out with us in the living room!

It is close to Lawrence Red Line Station, there is also Aldiâ€™s, Target, Ross, Marianoâ€™s, etc. few blocks away from the house. If youâ€™re craving Asian food, there is actually an Asian town few block down near Argyle Red Line Station. 

Also, if youâ€˜re here for the locals favorite hang out spot the Montrose beach is actually 15 minutes walk from the apartment. 

There is also few bars down the block and numerous of theater to see musicians and djâ€™s!

Best to use the public transportation or Uber/Lyft. Usually late at night it is difficult to find parking and the drivers here are rough!

description:
Shared living at its finest! Master bedroom with on suite bathroom available! Room is private and apartment is a four bedroom hotel with a shared living room and a fully equipped kitchen that is shared with others. With high end decor and extra space, this is the ultimate spot to live in Logan Square. With closet space and a beautiful backyard to boot! 

3 more bedrooms available for less $$ at this hotel, price reflects shared bathroom. Please let me know if you are interested in one of those.

additional_house_rules:
I realize that there are many rules, I have created them to make it safe for all guests. PLEASE READ ALL RULES so that you have a good stay :)
1.(ALL GUESTS MUST HAVE A GOVERNMENT ISSUED ID BEFORE MAKING A RESERVATION WITH US FOR SECURITY REASONS) If your reservation is for (2 occupants) I will require full names of all occupants that will occupy my home. I may also request identification to be displayed at the time of check-in if I feel your Airbnb photo does not match your appearance for the safety of all guests staying in my home. (please make sure you have a new photo uploaded to Airbnb to prevent any inconveniences at your check-in date. If you have a friend staying with you at my home please plan to check-in with your friends or meet up with them later to get your friends / family keys that will be staying at my home. 
2. (KEYS)  If your locked out of the apartment and I am required to take off work to meet you to let you in there will be a lockout fee of ($75.00).
3. NO UNAUTHORIZED GUESTS will be permitted INSIDE my home FOR ANY REASON. This is my home and I will not allow anyone to â€œVISIT YOUâ€ while you are in Chicago. If you would like to meet up with friends then you can coordinate a meeting at a public place. ANY unauthorized guest in my home and you will be charged a UNAUTHORIZED GUEST fee of ($500) dollars per day they are in apartment for the entire stay from your security deposit if they are not disclosed earlier on AirBNB and I have permitted your guests prior to your payment for your reservation. (Yes, I have had guests attempt to sneak in friends at night and I feel that this is unsafe for me so for that reason I have added this rule and the fine for violating the rules.)
4. (NO PACKAGES / NO MAIL / NO DELIVERIES) We will not accept packages or your mail to our address. You may not use our address for any sort of deliveries. If you have lost luggage in flight I can provide you my office address for the airlines to drop off your things the next day. 
5. (NO LOUD MUSIC NO PARTYS IN MY HOME) If I get a disturbance call from my neighbor of any disruptive behavior or see that you have unauthorized guests in my home on the hallway cameras you will be removed from my home with 0 refund given back.
6. (EMERGENCY SITUATIONS) If you have an emergency, please do contact us as I will require to alert anyone that can help you of the emergency. We are here to be helpful to you.
7. (NO ADDITIONAL CLEANING FEES UNLESS) Please be clean and make sure you wash your dishes and cups after use. If you create trash then you can throw it our yourself by going outside to the alley, If I find a mess (unwashed dishes, stains on the walls or floor) after your checkout there will be an additional cleaning fee taken from your security deposit (up to $200.00). I do not charge any extra cleaning fees if all guests have left the apartment and their room in the same condition as it was when they arrived at the check-in.
8. (RESPECT MY HOME) Please do not lay on sofa with shoes, Take your shoes off before entering rooms with carpet. 
9. (LINEN) You will get 1 towel per day per person, if you need more you will need to request it ahead of time via text, email, or phone call.
10. NO SMOKING OR DRUG USAGE will be tolerated inside the apartment.
11. (WIFI INTERNET) The Internet WiFi connection will only be for web browsing and/or Netflix. Do not download copyrighted material.
12. (DAMAGES TO MY PROPERTY) Make sure to leave my home in the SAME condition as you found it. If there is ANY damages while you stay in my home you will be charged for it. 
Towels Stained or Bleached = $10.00 each 
Stained / bleached sheets = $70.00 per set
Scratch walls = $50.00 fee per wall that's scuffed or scratched 
Stained carpets = $200.00 cleaning fee
Damage furniture or electronics = $FULL NEW PURCHASE PRICE
Any misuse of anything in the apartment and you will be responsible for the repair cost.
Do not flush anything down the toilet other than toilet paper, if a plumber is needed we will need to charge you. 
Sorry to be blunt but I can not keep paying out of pocket for sheets and towels that are destroyed while we share our home.
13. Please make sure that you notify us of anything that does not work or anything that you need changed (towels, linens) . We are your hosts, and we are here to help be the best that we can be for you.
14. Give us recommendations on anything you think we should change or do :) It helps me, trust me, it does. We have received many recommendations, and they have helped me vastly over the years.
15. Have a great time. We can help with that if you are in an unhappy or sour mood, just let us know :)
16. We are not a Bed and Breakfast and we do not provide free food or drinks.

description:
This is a beautiful newly remodeled 4 bedroom LEGAL vacation rental.  You won't have to sneak around here! You'll get entire floor to yourself and you will not share it with anyone. There's free parking available in front of the apartment.  This apartment is located a appropriate 12 minute driver to downtown, 12 minute drive to McCormick Place Convention Center!

*Bedroom 1  - Queen bed
*Bedroom 2 - Queen Bed
*Bedroom 3 - Queen bed
*Bedroom 4 - Queen bed
Living room 2 - Queen bed & twin bed & air mattress


*Two Entertainment Rooms..
*TWO Couches

*Kitchen with Pots, Pans, Silverware :)

You will have access to everything in the apartment! :)

MY FAMILY LIVES HERE TOO , let me know if you need anything .

Back of the Yards is an industrial and residential neighborhood so named because it was near the former Union Stock Yards, which employed thousands of European immigrants in the early 20th century. Life in this neighborhood was explored in Upton Sinclair's 1906 novel The Jungle. The area was formerly part of the town of Lake until it was annexed by Chicago in 1889. In the late 19th and early 20th centuries, the area was occupied largely by Eastern European immigrants and their descendants, who were predominantly ethnic Bohemian, Moravian, and Slovak.[2]

In the 1930s the activist Saul Alinsky did community organizing in this area, as its people suffered during the Great Depression. This work led to his founding the Industrial Areas Foundation in 1940, which trained community organizers.[3]

Jane Jacobs in her 1961 book, The Death and Life of Great American Cities, cites the Back of the Yards as an area able to "unslum" in the 1960s, due to a beneficial set of circumstances. This included a stabilized community base with skilled members who were willing to trade work to upgrade housing, as well as active and well-led local social and political organizations. Jacobs often cited the Back of the Yards as a model for other depressed neighborhoods to follow to upgrade their communities.[4]

Some time after the 1970s, when the stockyard operations closed and the number of nearby jobs decreased, many people left to move to newer housing and work in the suburbs. The population of the neighborhood gradually reflected a new wave of settlement, predominantly Mexican-American.

Free Parking in front on the street!
We have a rental fleet available if you would like to rent one of our cars! You must book a car in advance two weeks before your reservation starts. Cars run about $25 to $45 per day extra. 
McCormick Place Convention Center - 12 Minute Drive Away!
Millennium Park - 12 Minute Drive Away!

We are easy going and looking for easy going happy travelers. If you are not easy going and friendly please do not stay with us :)
house_rules:
I realize that there are many rules, I have created them to make it safe for all guests. PLEASE READ ALL RULES so that you have a good stay :)
1.(ALL GUESTS MUST HAVE A GOVERNMENT ISSUED ID BEFORE MAKING A RESERVATION WITH US FOR SECURITY REASONS) If your reservation is for (2 occupants) I will require full names of all occupants that will occupy my home. I may also request identification to be displayed at the time of check-in if I feel your Airbnb photo does not match your appearance for the safety of all guests staying in my home. (please make sure you have a new photo uploaded to Airbnb to prevent any inconveniences at your check-in date. If you have a friend staying with you at my home please plan to check-in with your friends or meet up with them later to get your friends / family keys that will be staying at my home. 
2. (KEYS)  If your locked out of the apartment and I am required to take off work to meet you to let you in there will be a lockout fee of ($75.00).
3. NO UNAUTHORIZED GUESTS will be permitted INSIDE my home FOR ANY REASON. This is my home and I will not allow anyone to â€œVISIT YOUâ€ while you are in Chicago. If you would like to meet up with friends then you can coordinate a meeting at a public place. ANY unauthorized guest in my home and you will be charged a UNAUTHORIZED GUEST fee of ($500) dollars per day they are in apartment for the entire stay from your security deposit if they are not disclosed earlier on AirBNB and I have permitted your guests prior to your payment for your reservation. (Yes, I have had guests attempt to sneak in friends at night and I feel that this is unsafe for me so for that reason I have added this rule and the fine for violating the rules.)
4. (NO PACKAGES / NO MAIL / NO DELIVERIES) We will not accept packages or your mail to our address. You may not use our address for any sort of deliveries. If you have lost luggage in flight I can provide you my office address for the airlines to drop off your things the next day. 
5. (NO LOUD MUSIC NO PARTYS IN MY HOME) If I get a disturbance call from my neighbor of any disruptive behavior or see that you have unauthorized guests in my home on the hallway cameras you will be removed from my home with 0 refund given back.
6. (EMERGENCY SITUATIONS) If you have an emergency, please do contact us as I will require to alert anyone that can help you of the emergency. We are here to be helpful to you.
7. (NO ADDITIONAL CLEANING FEES UNLESS) Please be clean and make sure you wash your dishes and cups after use. If you create trash then you can throw it our yourself by going outside to the alley, If I find a mess (unwashed dishes, stains on the walls or floor) after your checkout there will be an additional cleaning fee taken from your security deposit (up to $200.00). I do not charge any extra cleaning fees if all guests have left the apartment and their room in the same condition as it was when they arrived at the check-in.
8. (RESPECT MY HOME) Please do not lay on sofa with shoes, Take your shoes off before entering rooms with carpet. 
9. (LINEN) You will get 1 towel per day per person, if you need more you will need to request it ahead of time via text, email, or phone call.
10. NO SMOKING OR DRUG USAGE will be tolerated inside the apartment.
11. (WIFI INTERNET) The Internet WiFi connection will only be for web browsing and/or Netflix. Do not download copyrighted material.
12. (DAMAGES TO MY PROPERTY) Make sure to leave my home in the SAME condition as you found it. If there is ANY damages while you stay in my home you will be charged for it. 
Towels Stained or Bleached = $10.00 each 
Stained / bleached sheets = $70.00 per set
Scratch walls = $50.00 fee per wall that's scuffed or scratched 
Stained carpets = $200.00 cleaning fee
Damage furniture or electronics = $FULL NEW PURCHASE PRICE
Any misuse of anything in the apartment and you will be responsible for the repair cost.
Do not flush anything down the toilet other than toilet paper, if a plumber is needed we will need to charge you. 
Sorry to be blunt but I can not keep paying out of pocket for sheets and towels that are destroyed while we share our home.
13. Please make sure that you notify us of anything that does not work or anything that you need changed (towels, linens) . We are your hosts, and we are here to help be the best that we can be for you.
14. Give us recommendations on anything you think we should change or do :) It helps me, trust me, it does. We have received many recommendations, and they have helped me vastly over the years.
15. Have a great time. We can help with that if you are in an unhappy or sour mood, just let us know :)
16. We are not a Bed and Breakfast and we do not provide free food or drinks.

description:
Unwind and enjoy the city in our Cozy and Clean Guest Suite! 

We're new hosts on Airbnb and super excited to begin having guests stay at our recently furnished two bedroom guest space. 

We live in the main, separable part of the property and are excited for you to use our space as a home base for which to decompress or explore the city!  Both bedrooms have huge closet space, iron board w/ iron, kitchenette has a microwave, refrigerator, and eating utensils, and lastly a workstation.

Very peaceful space. We have neighborhoods underneath us that work during the week. Please keep noise down after 10 pm.

Guests have access to the bathroom and hallway area of the suite. Please do not open the door with the "Do Not Enter" sign.

We are available and a call/text away if needed.

Walk to shops, restaurants and nightlife on North, Division, and Chicago Ave. Super quiet tree-lined street.

Easy walk to CTA Blue Line

NO shoes allowed in bedrooms. Please kick your shoes off at the door and place them on the shoe rack.

access: Check in is available after 3pm to 10pm.
description:
My place located at 32nd floor in the heart of Chicago with stunning city views. Marvel at the views from the myriad windows of this stylish downtown pad. Sink into the comfy sofa with a good book, dine at the cozy bistro table while the city's lights come on, or head out to the ballpark on a balmy summer's evening. 
If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Willis Tower (0.5 miles) and Grant Park (1.1 miles). Shopping and dining on the Magnificent Mile is 1.2 miles away.

Apartment is in a luxury high-rise building in Chicago's West Loop neighborhood.

Free WIFI inside the apt and in all common areas.

The space has a 48" Plasma TV with Netflix, Amazon Prime videos

Kitchen Amenities with coffee machine and necessary dish ware. Laundry room is located at 3rd floor.

The location couldn't be better for visitors, as you can walk to a lot of attractions and sites. Public transportation is extremely convenient, and you definitely don't need a car to get around. It's close to all CTA lines and numerous bus stations.

Check in is available after 3pm to 10pm.

Enjoy being close to just about everything, including world-class food on Randolph St, the Sears Tower, River North nightlife, Riverwalk, Michigan Ave, Millennium Park, Union Station, and much more.

Parking in the city is very expensive! If you can avoid having a car, I recommend it. If not, your best option will be to download an app such as SpotHero or ParkWhiz to find discounted spots in parking lots throughout the area. If using public transportation, Chicago's public train system called The L is the best way to get around. There are redline, brownline, and blueline stops all within a few blocks of Bernham Pointe.

Parking is not free.
Check out time is 12pm.

The space has a 48" Plasma TV with Netflix, Amazon Prime videos

Kitchen Amenities with coffee machine and necessary dish ware. Laundry room is located at 3rd floor.

The location couldn't be better for visitors, as you can walk to a lot of attractions and sites. Public transportation is extremely convenient, and you definitely don't need a car to get around. It's close to all CTA lines and numerous bus stations.
summary:
My place located at 32nd floor in the heart of Chicago with stunning city views. Marvel at the views from the myriad windows of this stylish downtown pad. Sink into the comfy sofa with a good book, dine at the cozy bistro table while the city's lights come on, or head out to the ballpark on a balmy summer's evening. 
If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Willis Tower (0.5 miles) and Grant Park (1.1 miles). Shopping and dining on the Magnificent Mile is 1.2 miles away.
transit: Parking in the city is very expensive! If you can avoid having a car, I recommend it. If not, your best option will be to download an app such as SpotHero or ParkWhiz to find discounted spots in parking lots throughout the area. If using public transportation, Chicago's public train system called The L is the best way to get around. There are redline, brownline, and blueline stops all within a few blocks of Bernham Pointe.

additional_house_rules:
General Rules
-Please treat the home as if it is your own.
-Please respect our guest limit capacity of 8 people.
-Do not engage in illegal activities anywhere on the property.
-If you accidentally damage anything during your stay, please contact the host for your safety and the future safety of the next guest.
-We pride ourselves on being green and would appreciate you turning off the TV and lights when you check-out.
-Please remember to sign out of any ROKU apps you utilized via your personal accounts before departing.

Quiet Hours
Quiet hours are between 10p-8a.
This is a residential building and ask that for the respect of permanent tenants basic courtesies of being mindful of your noise levels and not congregating in hallways outside of the unit be observed.

Please be advised that this home is equipped with NoiseAware. NoiseAware works like a smoke detector, but for noise. The sensor tracks the decibel levels in this home, evaluates other risk factors and will send an alert if there are excess noise levels detected. Please do not unplug the device.

Receiving a noise complaint from the building or the device can result in the forfeiture of your stay and a $1000 fine. 

No Smoking
The home (and entire building including outdoor common areas) is designated as a strictly smoke-free community. There will be a $500 fee imposed if you choose to smoke in the building. Please respect our policy and step outside the vicinity.

Key Fob
The key fob is your way of accessing everything from your short-stay apartment to the amenity spaces in the building. If you happen to lose your key fob, you will be charged $75. 

Security
Please be advised that the building exterior and common spaces are equipped with surveillance devices. Please respect the building and its community. 

Emergencies
Contact your host immediately with any issues. An emergency maintenance number is provided in the home guide for any building issues that involve water or hazards in the home.

For medical, fire and police related emergencies please call 911.

access: The entire home as well as all building amenities are for you to enjoy!
description:
Welcome to HOLLAND DREAM ! All the amenities of a luxury hotel with as much space as a single-family home! Enjoy this unique newly constructed duplex 3 bed unit featuring a private terrace, in-unit washer/dryer, and open floor plan living space . Whether it's for business or pleasure, this home is your perfect home away from home. Hang at the coffee shop, bike rental, fitness facility, pool tables, a stylish rooftop deck lounge complete with fire pits, grills, and breath taking city views.

Sleeping Arrangements 
Master Bedroom - Queen Bed 
Bedroom 2 - Queen Bed 
Bedroom 3 - Queen Bed 
Living Room - pull out sleeper sofa (queen) + 2 cots (twin)*
*Please not that cots are available upon request only and need to be requested at the time of booking. We cannot accommodate last minute requests. 

Kitchen  
The kitchen is fully equipped with pots, pants, utensils, silverware, plates, bowls, cups, knives, a cutting board, salt and pepper, a coffee maker, and cream and sugar â€“ for however you take it.  
 
Cleaning Supplies  
Youâ€™re supplied with dish soap, a sponge, dish detergent and paper towels.

Washer/Dryer 
There is a washer/dryer in unit. We provide you with detergent for your stay!

TV
The Roku guide is posted next to the TV. There is also a digital antenna for local channels. Please remember to sign out of any of any Roku apps youâ€™ve utilize duringâ€¨your stay. 

Non-Smoking 
The home and entire building is designated as a smoke-free community. There will be a $500 fee imposed if you choose to smoke in unit or the building. Please respect our policy and step outside.

Deck 
Bring culinary inspiration to life on your private deck with outdoor grilling station!

Gym
The fitness center is equipped with free weights, strength training and cardio machines, you donâ€™t have to skip leg day on your vacation (if you donâ€™t want to).

Parking
There is no dedicated parking space for the home. We recommend using apps like SpotHero to locate discounted street or garage spots nearby.

The entire home as well as all building amenities are for you to enjoy!

We are off-site but available when needed. The best way to reach us is by emailing reservations@livly.io!  In case of maintenance emergency, the in-unit home guide will detail phone numbers of who to call immediately.

The perfect location for a weekend getaway or business trip. River North is a stylish urban neighborhood that borders the Magnificent Mile and is just across the bridge from the Loop, Millennium Park, and the downtown theater district. It is the go-to neighborhood for those who appreciate fine art and design, but is also a little quieter than being right in the middle of downtown. For those who appreciate fine dining and drinks, you can find everything from knockout noodles and Spanish small plates to high-end steakhouses and famed pizzerias. Just about every type of cuisine is covered in this mix of award-winning restaurants and local favorites. And for a fun evening out, slip into any of the sleek new clubs, upscale wine bars and craft cocktail lounges, many of which are walking distance from the home.

There is no dedicated parking space for the home. We recommend using apps like SpotHero to locate discounted street or garage spots nearby. 

The home is a short walk from the CTA brown line train at the "Chicago" stop. This train line will take you all over the city, including into the neighborhoods further north and south for exploring or down into the loop to catch a show or transfer to another train line.

Check In / Check Out
Check in starts at 4 PM CT
Check out time is 11 AM CT

We do not offer early Check In or late Check Out. 

Luggage Hold 
If your travel arrangements have you arriving earlier or leaving later than our designated check in / check out times, we recommend using Wait Here Chicago. We have a partnership with them and can offer you discounted rates on their luggage hold options throughout the city.

Pets
There is a $25/pet per booking fee. 

We know that all dogs are good dogs but the building's breed restrictions are listed below. There are no weight restrictions, but if your buddy falls under one of these categories unfortunately we wouldn't be able to host them: Pit Bull, American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, Shaffordshire Bull Terrier, Rottweiler, Doberman Pinscher, Chow Chow, Akita, Presa Canario and /or Wolf Hybrids.

While we trust that your pet plays well with others, we know that accidents happen. In the event of an issue involving your pet, you will be required to provide up to date vaccination records and will be fully liable for any medical, veterinary, or property damages incurred.

access: No need to be shy about making yourself at home in this swanky Chi-Town apartment; our place is yours and only yours during your stay. We do ask that you respect our neighbors by keeping noise to a reasonable level.
description:
Welcome to Chicago! Home of World Series Champs Cubs. Our 2-bedroom/1 bathroom condo is perfect for getaway to Chicago. It's professionally designed with modern furniture that gives welcome feeling! We're located in Trendy Logan Square

Designated parking spot is NOT available, but there is plenty of street parking available.

-The entire condo is for your own use.

-Parking is NOT included in your stay. 

-Professionally designed space with modern furniture.

-49" Flat Screen TV in the living room with Unlimited Netflix streaming.

-Brand new stainless steel appliances in the kitchen, including Fridge, Microwave, & Stove/Oven Range, Coffeemaker and Toaster.

-2 Bedrooms available! Bedrooms have large Queen size beds.  Living Room has Full size Sofa Sleeper. Sleeps up to 5 people comfortably!

-Basic Dinnerware, Cutlery, Drinking Glasses, and Pots & Pans provided.

-We provide towels, toilet paper, and shampoo, conditioner, and body wash for your use.

No need to be shy about making yourself at home in this swanky Chi-Town apartment; our place is yours and only yours during your stay. We do ask that you respect our neighbors by keeping noise to a reasonable level.

We are available by phone throughout your stay. You can simply call or text if you have any questions.

Logan Square is one of the city's vibrant neighborhoods, balancing family-friendly activities and a thriving community of Chicago's aspiring artists, musicians independent spirited folks. The vintage charm of Logan Theater hosts the annual Chicago Underground Film Festival for those cinephiles. It is also the home of the historical Illinois Centennial Memorial that commemorates Illinois statehood designed by the same architect who created the Lincoln Memorial in Washington DC.restored arcade machines.
Make your afternoon stroll or even a bike tour at Humboldt Park and Logan Square , as the community is graced with tree line boulevard and parks.
After the strolling, satisfy your taste buds in Logan Square's top dining destinations. A "must try" is a visit to Dos Urban Cantina, Diana DÃ¡vila's authentic Mexican fare at Mi Tocaya AntojerÃ­a to Abe Conlon's Macanese-influenced menu at Fat Rice and make that reservation ASAP at GIANT, Nightwood chef Jason Vincent's Logan Square restaurant. Of course for that sweet treats, head over to Logan's famous rotating ice cream shop â€“ Pretty Cool Ice Cream and make sure to line up at Bang Bang Pie and Biscuits. And when you feel like drinking, there's plenty of cocktail bars and pubs for the night crowd that you don't want to miss having a few of your favorite games at Emporium Arcade Bar, the neighborhood's popular destination of restored arcade machines.
Truly you don't want to miss out Logan Square's appeal of fancy restaurants, nightlife, specialty stores and fab finds at farmers markets, parks, arcade bars, galleries and theaters.

This area is very walkable â€” most errands can be accomplished on foot. Transit is good, with many nearby public transportation options. The best way to get around is with the CTA train and Bus. You can Uber/Lyft.  It's convenient to use a bike for most trips.

-There are many units inside this building.

-Please be aware If you lose the key and entry fob, which is your access to the entire building, it cannot be replaced for you immediately and you may lose access to the apartment unit and all amenities until another one can be made. There is a $300 fee for losing key and entry fob.

-All guests need to be attentive to the house rules during their stay, as they are other tenants at the property.

-Bath towels are provided per number of guest not per number of stay

-Washcloths are not provided during your stay. You may send me a message though if you need them and I'll try my best to accommodate your request.

-We have duvet covers on our beddings  (no top sheets).

-A Security Deposit may be required on some bookings. 

-If there's an issue during your stay, please report it real time so we can address it right away.

A "must try" is a visit to Dos Urban Cantina, Diana DÃ¡vila's authentic Mexican fare at Mi Tocaya AntojerÃ­a to Abe Conlon's Macanese-influenced menu at Fat Rice and make that reservation ASAP at GIANT, Nightwood chef Jason Vincent's Logan Square restaurant. Of course for that sweet treats, head over to Logan's famous rotating ice cream shop â€“ Pretty Cool Ice Cream and make sure to line up at Bang Bang Pie and Biscuits. And when you feel like drinking, there's plenty of cocktail bars and pubs for the night crowd that you don't want to miss having a few of your favorite games at Emporium Arcade Bar, the neighborhood's popular destination of restored arcade machines.
Truly you don't want to miss out Logan Square's appeal of fancy restaurants, nightlife, specialty stores and fab finds at farmers markets, parks, arcade bars, galleries and theaters.
notes:
-There are many units inside this building.

-Please be aware If you lose the key and entry fob, which is your access to the entire building, it cannot be replaced for you immediately and you may lose access to the apartment unit and all amenities until another one can be made. There is a $300 fee for losing key and entry fob.

-All guests need to be attentive to the house rules during their stay, as they are other tenants at the property.

-Bath towels are provided per number of guest not per number of stay

-Washcloths are not provided during your stay. You may send me a message though if you need them and I'll try my best to accommodate your request.

-We have duvet covers on our beddings  (no top sheets).

-A Security Deposit may be required on some bookings. 

-If there's an issue during your stay, please report it real time so we can address it right away.
space:
-The entire condo is for your own use.

-Parking is NOT included in your stay. 

-Professionally designed space with modern furniture.

-49" Flat Screen TV in the living room with Unlimited Netflix streaming.

-Brand new stainless steel appliances in the kitchen, including Fridge, Microwave, & Stove/Oven Range, Coffeemaker and Toaster.

-2 Bedrooms available! Bedrooms have large Queen size beds.  Living Room has Full size Sofa Sleeper. Sleeps up to 5 people comfortably!

-Basic Dinnerware, Cutlery, Drinking Glasses, and Pots & Pans provided.

-We provide towels, toilet paper, and shampoo, conditioner, and body wash for your use.
summary:
Welcome to Chicago! Home of World Series Champs Cubs. Our 2-bedroom/1 bathroom condo is perfect for getaway to Chicago. It's professionally designed with modern furniture that gives welcome feeling! We're located in Trendy Logan Square

Designated parking spot is NOT available, but there is plenty of street parking available.
transit: This area is very walkable â€” most errands can be accomplished on foot. Transit is good, with many nearby public transportation options. The best way to get around is with the CTA train and Bus. You can Uber/Lyft.  It's convenient to use a bike for most trips.

Experience can't-miss city views in this 2 bedroom/2 bath apartment near Navy Pier. This space comes with modern amenities such as a rooftop lounge area and fitness center. Here youâ€™ll find all the comforts of home: full kitchen, custom artwork, and furnishings curated to reflect the beauty of the Windy City.

This two bedroom unit features a queen size bed in each room. Additoonally, there is a sofa bed and air mattress in the living room.

Guests also have access to the building's state of the art fitness center, indoor pool and indoor spa! Additionally, there is a laundry room in the building.

This Domio is conveniently located in between Chicago's River North and Gold Coast neighborhoods. Easily walk to many restaurants and bars from this central location. Additionally, the 'Chicago' Red Line station is a 5 minute walk, while the 'Chicago' Purple/Brown line station is a 6 minute walk.

additional_house_rules:
- This is our home, so please respect it and book accordingly. Thanks!
- No Smoking.
- No Drugs.
- No Pets.
- Price is based on 2 adults. Our place can accommodate up to 4 max. Up to two additional Adults (18+) are $25 per person, per night. Up to two additional kids (under 18) Free. But never more than four people MAX. Additional guests must be included in the reservation. When we refer to 2 beds in the listing, we mean: Bed #1 is the Queen size in the bedroom; Bed #2 is the couch, or an airmatress which we will provide upon request. We always strive to be flexible. Please feel free to ask.
- Cleaning Fee:  $75
- Please do not open the personal closet or office in bedroom.   
- Feel free to use the entire hall closet, and empty chest of drawers. 
- Guests who are not listed on part of the reservation are not allowed on the property or condo. No exceptions.  
- Please turn off electricity when leaving.  Please don't light any candles. 
- Please always use placemat and coasters on table.
- Guest Parking in front of Building is included, if available.  But you must sign enter your car info in the book in the lobby.
- Feel free to use necessities:  laundry detergent, dishwasher soap, windex, cleaning supplies, spices, tea, coffee.

access: We live here, so the office & personal closet are unavailable to guests.  You *will* have space in the hall closet & in the chest of drawers.
description:
Uptown Neighborhood.  3 blocks to train. Bus stop to Downtown & Magnificent Mile is at the end of the block. $14 uber to downtown.  Quiet, Safe, tree-lined street.  The Lakefront path is right across the street, Grocery, Restaurants.   Price is for 2 adults, up to 4 people max. See House Rules.

We're very accommodating -- please just ask! *THIS IS OUR HOME, so please respect it.* We're happy to help.  We are always a phone call away!

The location is key.  The condo is one block from Lake Michigan, its parks, and the lakefront biking and walking path.   It's also is right off Lake Shore Drive, which makes commute by bus / uber / taxi super convenient to Downtown, the Loop, Millenium Park, Navy Pier, etc.   The Red Line train is also three blocks away and gets you to the same spots.

-Mariano's grocery store (4 blocks)
-Restaurants row of Little Asia (2 blocks)
-Starbucks (5 blocks)
-Music venues (5 blocks)
-Andersonville/Swedish area with bars, pubs, restaurants (1.5 miles)
-Wrigley-ville (1.8 miles)

We live here, so the office & personal closet are unavailable to guests.  You *will* have space in the hall closet & in the chest of drawers.

Please don't hesitate to contact either Adam or Thadd with anything that comes up.

We'd rather know about it & fix it so you're happy!

Quiet tree-lined street, with restaurants a few blocks away.

Bus stop to downtown is at the end of the block.
CTA Red line train, Argyle stop, is 3 blocks away

access:
- You will have access to the entire unit, and to the laundry machines in the basement. 
- No access to the closet in the kitchen (by the fridge)
description:
Cheerful 2-bedroom* condo designed to be your home base in Chicago! Makeover just completed with new furniture, dÃ©cor, linens, RokuTV and colorful design. You will be surrounded by some of the trendier restaurants, bars and shops in Chicago but be only 20min from the loop via train. 

+ Walk Score 89 ("Very Walkable")
+ Bike Score 82 ("Very Bikeable")
+ Transit Score 71 ("Excellent Transit")

+ Great for couples, families, a group of friends, solo or business
+ Friendly and responsive Superhosts

* 3 beds with room for a total of 6 people
* Spacious master with Queen bed, desk and bright seating area
* 2nd bedroom w/ Queen bed & seating area (NOTE: semi-private- no lock/door)
* Flat screen HDTV with Roku (access Netflix, Amazon with your account)
* Living room with comfy couch and chairs to enjoy during the day. 
* By night the sofa converts into a pull out bed
* Access to washer/dryer in the basement 
* Complimentary high-speed wireless internet
* Bathroom stocked with hair dryer, toiletries, and plenty of fresh towels
* Private secure entrance with keyless entry
* Kitchen with coffee maker, serveware, new appliances and bright seating area
* Iron & Board
* FREE street parking

â˜… Ready to book and new to Airbnb? Use www.airbnb.com/c/kproano1 to join and recieve a $40 travel credit towards your first booking â˜…

- You will have access to the entire unit, and to the laundry machines in the basement. 
- No access to the closet in the kitchen (by the fridge)

We will not be on site during your stay, but consider us your concierge that's just a message away! We will be happy to provide restaurant and activity recommendations and answer any questions that come up during your stay.

Logan Square is HOT! Cutting edge restaurants, cafes, and breweries could keep you from ever wandering away. We're a 5 min walk from the new 606 Elevated Trail (think New York HighLine) which offers exhilarating walking, jogging or biking opportunities as you coast above the city. The Western stop of the "L" Blue Line is a short 8 minute walk and bus transportation in or out of the city is ample.

Walk to everything! 5 minutes to Divvy Bike Station, 606 trail, "restaurant row" on Armitage including Mexican, Italian & Indian. Several more highly regarded restaurants, cafes and bars nearby. 8 minutes to the Western stop of the blue line which can get you downtown in 15 minutes and to O'Hare airport in 30 minutes. Wide Lyft/Uber coverage gets you anywhere fast. 

The Armitage bus runs East/West and stops 1 block north of the building.

Chicago has Uber, Lyft, and car-sharing services like GetAround, ZipCar, and Enterprise Car Share. Street parking is free and relatively easy to find.

- Please note second bedroom is semi-private. It separates off from the rest of the apartment but does not have a locking door
-Free Street Parking (always check for temporary posted restrictions)
-The two front units (your unit is in back) are occupied full time. Please be respectful of the neighbors!

- No pets
- No parties
- No photoshoots
- No smoking
- No access to the closet in the kitchen (by the fridge)
-No shoes on the carpet
interaction: We will not be on site during your stay, but consider us your concierge that's just a message away! We will be happy to provide restaurant and activity recommendations and answer any questions that come up during your stay.
neighborhood_overview: Logan Square is HOT! Cutting edge restaurants, cafes, and breweries could keep you from ever wandering away. We're a 5 min walk from the new 606 Elevated Trail (think New York HighLine) which offers exhilarating walking, jogging or biking opportunities as you coast above the city. The Western stop of the "L" Blue Line is a short 8 minute walk and bus transportation in or out of the city is ample.

* Spacious master with Queen bed, desk and bright seating area
* 2nd bedroom w/ Queen bed & seating area (NOTE: semi-private- no lock/door)
* Flat screen HDTV with Roku (access Netflix, Amazon with your account)
* Living room with comfy couch and chairs to enjoy during the day. 
* By night the sofa converts into a pull out bed
* Access to washer/dryer in the basement 
* Complimentary high-speed wireless internet
* Bathroom stocked with hair dryer, toiletries, and plenty of fresh towels
* Private secure entrance with keyless entry
* Kitchen with coffee maker, serveware, new appliances and bright seating area
* Iron & Board
* FREE street parking

summary:
Cheerful 2-bedroom* condo designed to be your home base in Chicago! Makeover just completed with new furniture, dÃ©cor, linens, RokuTV and colorful design. You will be surrounded by some of the trendier restaurants, bars and shops in Chicago but be only 20min from the loop via train. 

+ Walk Score 89 ("Very Walkable")
+ Bike Score 82 ("Very Bikeable")

+ Great for couples, families, a group of friends, solo or business
+ Friendly and responsive Superhosts

description:
Clean, newly refurbished studio apartment in the DePaul area of Lincoln Park. Private entrance, queen bed, hardwood floors, private bath and small kitchenette. Plenty of free street parking. Easy walk to public transportation, incredible restaurants, music venues and shopping. Lake Michigan beaches, Lincoln Park Zoo, Wrigley Field and many other attractions are a short bike or train ride away. The rapid transit train system provides a quick trip to downtown Chicago.

This cozy, charming apartment is located in the front of a classic vintage 3-flat building on a tree-lined street. The space is approximately 350 square feet and sits three steps down from the ground floor facing the front garden. Although itâ€™s a studio apartment the layout has a multi-room feel. We have a lovely garden and patio in the backyard thatâ€™s available and accessible to guests. The kitchenette is equipped with a refrigerator, toaster, coffeemaker, electric kettle and a microwave for your convenience. Thereâ€™s always a fresh supply of coffee and tea along with some snacks. The building is owner-occupied. We live on a quiet residential street but our neighborhood is loaded with things to do. Itâ€™s a walkerâ€™s paradise! Enjoy all that our city has to offer!

I live in the building and work nearby so I'm available in-person or via phone at any time. I'm a lifelong Chicagoan and have been in this building for over 30 years.

Our location is an 8 minute walk from the CTA train line where you can catch the Red Line or the Brown Line trains. Those will get you downtown, to Wrigley Field or numerous other locations that travelers would be drawn to. Less than a block away is a Divvy bicycle station where you can rent a bike for a half hour or the entire day. The Fullerton Bus can be accessed right around the corner from our street. For those with a car we'll provide zoned parking passes and there are always spots open on our street.
house_rules:
No cooking on the premises
Quiet hours after 10:30pm

additional_house_rules:
House Rules:
Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund.

1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable.
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out fee.
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance.
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily.
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property.
6.) Lockouts will result in a $150 fee per occurrence. Additionally, lost keys will incur a $50 per key fee.
7.) Do not exit through the apartment front door except in cases of emergencies; the exit is alarmed.

access: Guests have access to the entire first floor of the building, back yard and patio.  Entry and exit is through the back door only.
description:
*SPECIAL* Jan-Feb Stay 7+ nights at 20% off OR 30+ at 25% off! 

Welcome to our beautiful 3 bedroom apartment just blocks from Loyola University.  Fully furnished apartment with one queen bed, two full beds, and one pull-out futon.  Amenities include full kitchen, dining room, and 2 bathrooms.  WiFi, cable, 3 televisions throughout the apartment and sunroom and back yard too! Close to public transportation, the lake, and dozens of dining options within walking distance.

You'll walk into the apartment's kitchen, where you'll find (among everything else you'd expect in a kitchen!) plenty of welcome materials. Just beyond is the dining room, with seating for 6, and French doors to the sun room. Along the hallway are 3 bedrooms: 1 with a Full-sized bed, and 2 with Queen-sized beds, and 2 full baths. At the end of the hallway is our living room, with decorative fireplace, large TV, and plenty of seating (including an overstuffed chair in a large, sunny bay window.)

Guests have access to the entire first floor of the building, back yard and patio.  Entry and exit is through the back door only.

We are on a beautiful, quiet residential street, with tons of amenities within walking distance.  Guest can be comfortable relaxing in the home, walking around the neighborhood, or using it as a home base to jump on public transportation downtown.

We are within walking distance to the Loyola Red Line station, which will take you to Wrigley Field in 15 minutes or downtown in around 20 minutes.  Ideal for anyone with a car or traveling using public transportation.

additional_house_rules:
Most important rule - enjoy ! 

Culture - my ideal traveler(s) : 


I would like clean and quiet guests who want to fully enjoy the home and neighborhood (and city) as if it were their own. I am an easy-going owner, who wants my guests to feel right at home. 

No smoking inside ( outside only ) no pets without prior acceptance, nothing too loud / too late.

I have put a lot of love into the design and comforts of this property, and I'm so excited for travelers to come and enjoy. 


 - make this your home away from home during your stay .

access:
Suite -Master bedroom & connected luxury full walk- in glass shower and attached dressing area separate from bedroom .
Suite .

In addition to your private master bedroom and attached private bathroom , you have a full back 14 foot deck and built in breakfast nook.  There is also a relaxing dining room and luxurious sofa in the front of the home for common use.

One garage spot for you to use - no additional charge . 




This is a unique place , it's always private no matter how you book .
description:
My place is close to Lake Michigan, Whole Foods, Red Line, Andersonville. 

The rental -Master Bed & Bath for sleeping and all common areas such as , kitchen , living room , adjoining dining room , kitchen , breakfast room and 14 foot deck. 

The suit / sleeping has an Upscale King mattress and linens. Very unique and cozy suite, with designer full Carrera bathroom. Free wifi throughout, and a tv in-room.

This flat was completely rehabbed.


The entire flat is only for your use.

Quiet tree-lined street, with close proximity to two of Chicago's hottest neighborhoods: Andersonville and Edgewater. Three blocks to Lake Michigan (Ardmore Beach) or the train to everywhere else. Or...stay "home" and enjoy the huge private deck and backyard. Hit the many great restaurants within walking distance, or walk to the neighborhood Whole Foods and make dinner in the homes gourmet kitchen.

If booking as one or two adults you are reserving the suite only and have full use of all common areas . There is an additional room with a queen bed and an extra full bath that may be reserved for you if you have more than 2 persons in your party . See additional pricing for more than two persons . 

I have marketed this Flat without the additional bedroom and bathroom in order to be able to offer you this amazing space at a discounted price . 


Unique privacy always with your own suite and private use and access to all common areas . 

There will be coffee / essentials and lite breakfast items .

Suite -Master bedroom & connected luxury full walk- in glass shower and attached dressing area separate from bedroom .
Suite .

In addition to your private master bedroom and attached private bathroom , you have a full back 14 foot deck and built in breakfast nook.  There is also a relaxing dining room and luxurious sofa in the front of the home for common use.

One garage spot for you to use - no additional charge . 




This is a unique place , it's always private no matter how you book .

I am happy to suggest all the best hidden surprises of this incredible city .

Close to the lake , close / literally one block to the redline and around the corner from whole foods . 
Edgewater is one of the nicest neighborhoods with many ethnic restaurants , antique shops and 2nd hand shopping . 

Andersonville is within walking distance and is a wonderful addition to your proximity of your stay .

Lake - beach is literally three blocks away .

Red line (el train) is just 3 blocks away. 
Public transportation is easy . Car services arrive quickly . If you have a rental , a garage spot is available - no charge .

Maximum persons that the entire flat can accommodate would be up to5 persons.
house_rules:
Most important rule - enjoy ! 

Culture - my ideal traveler(s) : 


I would like clean and quiet guests who want to fully enjoy the home and neighborhood (and city) as if it were their own. I am an easy-going owner, who wants my guests to feel right at home. 

No smoking inside ( outside only ) no pets without prior acceptance, nothing too loud / too late.

I have put a lot of love into the design and comforts of this property, and I'm so excited for travelers to come and enjoy. 


 - make this your home away from home during your stay . 

Help yourself to all the basics in the kitchen and hopefully you will use the full kitchen and the breakfast nook area to enjoy meals , conversation and reading your morning paper .

additional_house_rules:
***Surveillance cameras are present at each entrance to the home, in the kitchen, living room, and stairwell. All cameras are on at all times.*** 

Check-In Rules:
Unfortunately, I will not always be able to personally meet all guests at their desired check in time.

If I'm unable to meet you, I'll provide the Digital Door Lock Code with very detailed instructions for entry which will be messaged through Airbnb messenger at your Check-In time. You'll be given instant access to the building whenever you arrive! Please TAKE YOUR SHOES OFF upon entering the home. 

Food and Beverages:
There is absolutely NO consumption of food or beverages (excluding water) outside of the kitchen, kitchen bar, and dining room.

All food and beverages in the fridge and kitchen cabinets belong to other guests and your host. Refrain from taking food/beverages that were not brought in or purchased by you. Coffee, creamer, and sugar on the coffee bar in the kitchen are complimentary and you may have as much of it as you'd like. 

Guest Policy:
"Guest" constitutes any person entering the property, whether spending the night or only visiting. Unverified, unauthorized guests are not allowed on the premises. If you'd like to have a guest during your stay, your guest MUST be verified and announced through the AirBnb messenger and approval of this guest must be explicitly given by us, the hosts. Violation of this rule will result in immediate cancellation of your reservation and termination of your stay. 

Mail:
Please notify the host if you want to have Mail/Parcels shipped to you during your stay.

Quiet Hours:
Quiet Hours at the residence are between the hours of 10pm and 7am Sunday-Thursday and 12am and 7am on Friday-Saturday.

This is a Shared Space with many Travelers all visiting Chicago for a different purpose.  Having common courtesy is more than enough to fulfill this rule.  If you're a Late Night personality, please respect those waking up early for work.  If you're up at the crack of dawn, please get ready as quietly as possible as to not disturb those still asleep.

Smoking:
There is absolutely no smoking inside of the building.  This includes Electronic Cigarettes and all other forms of Tobacco.

Travelers are more than welcome to Smoke outside of the building.  


Weapons:
Absolutely NO WEAPONS of any sort are allowed inside of the building.  This includes Firearms, Knives, and anything else that can be used in a malicious manner.  Host(s) will have Final Say in what constitutes as a weapon.

Violence:
There will be no violence of any sort tolerated inside of the building.  This includes Physical Violence, Verbal (Arguing, Threats, Intimidation, etc.), and any sort of behavior that causes another person in the house to feel upset. 

â€˜Common Senseâ€™ Rule:
As this is a Shared Building, guests are expected to act in a way which is both Respectful and Inviting to everyone else sharing the space.   Actions which are deemed to have a Negative Impact on the overall experience of the other travelers will not be tolerated.  A few examples of this would be:  Leaving Dishes unwashed in the sink, being excessively messy or loud, or just having a negative, unwelcoming attitude.  If Behavior is causing other Travelers to feel uncomfortable, we will ask you to make necessary corrections, if these corrections are not made, we will terminate your stay.

Illegal Activity:
Any action which is in violation of any law within the city of Chicago and the state of Illinois is grounds for instant Termination


Check-Out Rules:
Check out is at 10AM, which is when the cleaning crew arrives. 
All guests that FAIL to vacate the premises prior to the 10AM check out will be charged $50 - No Exceptions!

- Bedroom 
- Bathrooms - Shared with all Travelers
